documentation.title: Class names
documentation.standard: Class names should always start with an uppercase letter. Multiple words should be separated with an underscore, and not CamelCased. All other class methods should be entirely lowercased and named to clearly indicate their function, preferably including a verb. Try to avoid overly long and verbose names.

code_comparison.code: class SuperClass // words not separated with underscores and words next to the first one start with an upper case class superclass // words not separated with underscores class Super_Class // words next to the first one start with an upper case
